did.head: Descriptive Summary
did.repository: Special Collections, Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University, Blacksburg, Va.
did.abstract: A handmade scrapbook containing pictures of VPI scenes and campus buildings, ca. 1900.Â

userestrict.head: Use Restrictions
userestrict.p: Permission to publish material from Eustis A. Lancaster Papers must be obtained from Special Collections, Virginia Tech.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Researchers wishing to cite this collection should include the following information: Eustis A. Lancaster Papers, Ms1971-003, Special Collections, Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University, Blacksburg, Va.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: The Eustis A. Lancaster Papers collection was acquired prior to 1971.

processinfo.head: Processing Information
processinfo.p: The processing, arrangement, and description of the Eustis A. Lancaster Papers was completed in 1971. Additional description was completed in April 2011.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: A handmade scrapbook containing pictures of VPI scenes and campus buildings, ca. 1900. On the cover of the scrapebook is a message which states, " VPI, For E.A. Lancaster, my friend and benefactor."

controlaccess.head: Subjects:
controlaccess.subject: Virginia Agricultural and Mechanical College and Polytechnic Institute
